creditline: Gift of George W. Rickey in memory of Edith L. Rickey
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rounded body on tall, thick base; long, thin neck; beaded overall, with black, red, white and blue grid on base and black, white, green, blue, red and pink radiating diamonds on body and neck
medium: Beads, plant fibers, cloth, gourd, wood
title: Beaded Bottle
